resources.string:
It’ll take 10 days. We’ll remove:
— personal data
— saved addresses
— order history
— personal offers
— your dodocoins
This product was not found in menu
Delivery address could not be selected, please try again
But we can send you push notification and SMS when we start and give a free pizza with your first order on this address
Please select address from the suggestions
Add the address or choose from the suggested
The address is temporarily not serviced
Your address is currently out of delivery area
We don’t deliver there yet, but we’re coming soon!
We’ll let you know when we open nearby. In the meantime, you can order for pickup — just in case you’re around
Sorry, this address is outside our delivery zone. Please order for collection or enter another address.
We are fixing it now and it will restart working soon. Till then you can order through our website %1$s or to call our customer-center
We are trying to fix the issues ASAP. As for now you can place your order on the web %1$s.
Please restart the app to change the country
Oops! Even AI can mess up sometimes…
Working our magic to generate a pizza for you…
Our AI-сhef is a bit of a perfectionist, but it’s almost ready…
Just need another sec to double check…
It\'s going to be legendary. Just wait for it...
Сooking up a masterpiece that\'s out of this digital world…
It\'s hot in the digital kitchen today, lots of orders…
Giving the finishing touches to your pizza marvel…
Skip this step if you don’t have any
%1$s, here’s your AI pizza. Shall we make it real?
So, here’s your AI pizza. Shall we make it real?
AI came up with the recipe for my pizza! Should I order it?
Experiment, create new recipes, and turn them into reality!
Please log in to leave a review or ask a question
Try again or place an order by phone call
Try again or place an order via %s
Have you enjoyed your Dodo experience?
It\'s impossible to change your birthday date after installing the app. Add date here %1$s?
We offer discounts and gifts for your birthday. \nUnfortunately, the birthday date cannot be modified.
The bonus deal is successfully applied, check the cart for the details
You cannot add an address without an internet connection
There was an error when placing an order, try again
Do you want to cancel your order №%1$s?
Right now you cannot place a pending order
Your shopping cart is empty, add\n the preferred item from \"Menu\".
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the combo
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the desserts
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the drink
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the pizza
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the ingredient: %s
We can\'t add it.\nReplace the sides
We can\'t add it to the cart
Quantity of some items has changed
The amount will not be saved
Please put amount higher that the order cost
Order for %s.\n From what amount should change be prepared?
We can send you a message, when delivery opens
We will send you a message when the delivery area will cover your address.
We will send you a message when the delivery area will cover your address.\n\nNow you can choose take-away, place an order and collect it yourself.
At the moment we do not deliver pizza to this address
If we don\'t deliver before %1$s we\'ll give you a promo code for free pizza
New products and promos from Dodo Pizza
We\'ll inform where the pizza is
Products from the \"Others\" category are not included in minimal delivery amount
There are many orders now. We can prepare your order later
We are not accepting orders yet
Payment failed. Try again or choose another payment option
This payment method is currently unavailable.\nChoose another
How would you like to pay?
How would you like to get your order?
Flash dodocoins are credited in addition to the basic cashback, but they burn out faster. Be sure to let us know the expiration date
We remind you about expiring dodocoins in advance so you’ll have time to spend them
Ingredient ran out and we removed: %1$s
Create your Dodo-combo, the price won\'t change
Support is now in your profile
We\'ll reach out to you soon
Payment service error. Try again later
Sorry, we don\'t deliver here yet, try a different location
It might take us longer to deliver due to a high volume of orders
Are you sure you want to delete this card %s?
This fee helps us deliver our hot and tasty pizzas superfast.
Delivery address could not be selected, please try again
There was an error when trying to install this type of delivery, try again
We have saved it and when ordering we will fill it in automatically.
The review will be sent\nto the pizzeria
The review was not sent.\nYou can send it later from your profile
Depends on the store\'s workload and the total amount of your order
Failed to launch the camera app
Unfortunately, file was deleted from server
Failed to send the message, check the connection
You cannot send the message at the moment
The file exceeds the maximum allowed size of %1$dMB

There are no permissions to the Camera and External Storage

To grant permissions, click "Settings", then "Permissions" and enable them.

Then return to the app.

There is no permission to Memory (Reading from external storage).

To grant permissions, click "Settings", then "Permissions" and enable them.

Then return to the app.
Can we help you with anything else?
The delivery addresses will be saved here.
We\'ll keep all your orders here. Go to the menu for the first one.
I want to receive personalized offers and promotions
Something went wrong, please try again later
An error occurred when attempting to send the rating info.\n You can send it later in your profile
Failed to load the list of pizzerias
Delivery is free. Just fill your cart to the minimum amount — it may vary depending on the pizzeria\'s workload

We want to make sure that pizza
will get to you.

If you already did order before from our website, please 
insert your phone number — and the previous addresses will appear when ordering.
Unfortunately, we just run out of one of the products. Go back to your cart and please delete it from the order
Unfortunately, in the selected pizzeria this item is out of stock: \n%1$s
No worries, everything is fine!\nTry to refresh the page,\nmaybe it will fix itself
Our drivers are a little busier than expected, so we temporarily increased the delivery fee to ensure that our pizzas will arrive hot and quickly.
Indicate the table number, and we will take care of the rest :)
At this time pizzeria will be closed
I consent to processing of %1$s and %2$s
We’ll get in touch when our pizza store is open and you can enjoy your free pizza.

Looked everywhere \nand did not find such a pizzeria

We didn\'t find such a pizzeria. You may have selected too many filters
You need to save up some dodocoins
Choose the items to spend the dodocoins on
Here will be your history of debiting and accrual of dodocoins
That\'s it, there are no more records
We will check it within 24 hours
Hmm, your answer is shorter than %s characters. Please complete it
You don\'t have any missions yet
We charge dodocoins after the order is placed

With every 2 AED spent, get rewarded with 1 dodocoin in our loyalty program. Exchange dodocoins for selected items on the menu. You can view your balance and choose the items by clicking on your Profile in the app.
We could\'t locate you, enter the address manually
Something went wrong, try again later
Please fill in all the required fields
The map is not available\n Perhaps you do not have access

The minimum order price for delivery — %s
Add more items for %1$s for delivery
We will deliver your order from %s
And we\'ll deliver your from just %s
This version of the app is not supported anymore, please update the app
No internet connection\nPlease check your connection

After that, we will go to celebrate New Year
with our dearest & nearest ones.
We will be back on January, 1 at noon,
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, dear friends!
Then we\'ll hurry up to celebrate the New Year. On January 1st we open at 12:00

Get a promotional code for one of the bonus products when ordering in the mobile app. The higher the purchase amount, the more expensive the bonus product. You can apply the promotional code at the next order in the Dine-in / Pick-up tab within 10 days from the date of receipt. Bonus products are not cumulative.
Will appear in the profile within half an hour after receiving the order
This amount is not enough to pay for the order
Nice try! But there is\nno match. Could you please try\nto change your request?
Your review was not sent.\nTap \'Yes\' or \'No\' to continue.
You have received a new message
How would you rate our support today?
Please enable them in the application settings
Hmm, it seems push notifications are off
Displaying 20 previous orders for the past 90 days
\nPlease hold, your order was successfully paid for and it will soon be created
The order was received and soon it will appear here. After that you can follow all the preparation stages here.
Your order was received and will soon appear in your profile.
Share your feedback on the order
We are sorry about that. Please tell us more about what went wrong
What did you like in your order?
Your order will be ready by %1$s
Your order will be ready by %1$s
The order sending failed. The amount will bet back to your bank within 10 days, afterwards, the speed of crediting your account depends on your bank. Please order by phone.
An error occurred when paying online
Payment processing session expired, please try again.
The wait is a little long, we agree

Payment is secure. We do not store card info, all
transactions are processed by %s — a payment
system, certified with the international security
standard PCI DSS.
online payment is not available on your device
Failed to update a tax payer ID
The promotion is activated. Add to the cart the products that fall under the conditions
Hurray! There are plenty to choose from
and agree to receive SMS — no spam, we promise
You will be able to save delivery addresses\n and quickly place orders
We’ll notify you of the opening and gift a pizza
Unfortunately, we can’t send OTP to phone numbers in your country
We can\'t send SMS to this country\'s number
The code was sent to number\n%1$s
The code was sent by SMS to\n%1$s
Enter the code from the SMS
We are offering a Pepperoni for 100 ₽. \nYou can find the store addresses of the pizzerias participating in the promo on dododay.ru
Today is the Day Of The Pizza!
The store is closed. Come back later
We don\'t deliver at the moment
There was an error when placing an order, try again
Please note \n that the price has been changed
Price on some items has changed
We will send you a gift notification
Use the gift\non your next order
Add an address to place an order
We will offer you a gift on your birthday,\nsave the delivery address\nand tell you about promotions
We will soon discover another secret!
The profile will be deleted today
Done! We’re glad you decided to stay
You can switch the language in your phone settings

You agree to receive advertising offers on telecommunication networks (SMS, push, email, etc) from Dodo Pizza. You are entitled to refuse to receive this information anytime by clicking “Unsubscribe” in the marketing message on your email or in settings of your device.
Want to receive secret discounts and gifts?
Want to receive secret discounts and gifts?
Success! Now you will receive messages with promotions and news
The promo code cannot be an empty field.
Error when inserting promo code, try again later.
The promo code was inserted incorrectly.
Not all the promotional conditions were followed.
You review and feedback will help us to improve
How do you like our App?
Check all the conditions: friend and you must be from the same country, you haven\'t ordered yet, and the app is up to date. Check and try again
Let it be as it is
The country of the friend who invited you is %1$s. In another country, you will not be able to apply its code. Do you want to change the country?
It seems not the right country!
Something went wrong and the bonus didn\'t work. Double-check the conditions for receiving the bonus and try again
If your friend doesn’t have the app yet, scan the QR-code. If the app had been downloaded before, it should be updated
It can be entered in the profile or as a promo code in the cart. A friend must be a new user and live in the same country as you
Dodocoins! An invited gets them instantly and you receive your share after the friend’s first order\'s first order
You and your friend get dodocoins
Make sure the friend already has the app installed, it\'s up to date, the friend hasn\'t ordered yet, and you\'re in the same country
coins from the amount of the first order of a friend
as a gift with the first order
Scan with your camera to download the app
So far no one has been invited
You’ve invited the maximum number of friends
If the code doesn\'t arrive,\nyou can get a new one in %1$s sec
Delivery address could not be selected, please try again
We\'ll pack your pizza in a free reusable case and take it back after delivery
Next time you won\'t need to fill in the card info again. You will be able to unlink the card in your profile settings.
Save the card for future orders
No pizza store has opened yet in this city\n
Hold a secret offer — it’s\na gift for your curiosity

We want to make sure that pizza\nwill get to you.
Sorry, we are late. Details at the checkout.
Running late, but speeding to you
It\'s important to stack the boxes on top of each other evenly. Play as much as you like, claim your winnings once a day
We will credit them after delivery. Then you can just play like that. New dodocoins will be available when ordering on another day
Some of the products are out of stock now or we\'ve run out of some ingredients
